item.title: 集团首席财务官称，阿达尼绿色美元债券可能在 2025 年中恢复发行
item.description: 阿达尼绿色能源有限公司（Adani Green Energy Ltd.）集团首席财务官朱格希德-辛格（Jugeshinder Singh）周五表示，该公司将考虑在 4 月至 6 月间重新发行已被取消的美元债券，这表明尽管美国对公司创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）进行了调查，但该企业集团仍具有顽强的生命力。【原文：Adani Green Energy Ltd. will consider resurrecting its scrapped dollar bond between April and June, Group Chief Financial Officer Jugeshinder Singh said Friday, in a show of the conglomerate’s resilience despite the US probe against founder Gautam Adani.】

item.title: 米莱首次阿根廷私有化遭遇 5.36 亿美元债务困扰
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统将阿根廷首次向私营部门出售一长串国营企业的申请的截止日期定在了 12 月，这表明了政府在卸载企业方面将面临多大的挑战。【原文：President Javier Milei is imposing a December deadline on Argentina’s first bid to sell a long list of state-run companies to the private sector, outlining how challenging it will be for the government to unload businesses.】

item.title: 加纳银行在通胀升温后暂停加息
item.description: 加纳银行维持基准利率不变，原因是国内经济活动有所改善，但通货紧缩的步伐有些迟缓。【原文：The Bank of Ghana left its benchmark interest rate unchanged, amid improvements in domestic economic activity and some sluggishness in the pace of disinflation.】

item.title: 通胀目标近在眼前，维勒鲁瓦呼吁欧洲央行降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行应继续降息，因为欧元区通胀率有可能在 2025 年上半年达到 2%。【原文：The European Central Bank should continue cutting interest rates as euro-area inflation is likely to reach 2% in the first half of 2025, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司斥资 7.5 亿美元在尼日利亚实施天然气项目以促进液化天然气供应
item.description: 法国能源巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）明年可能会在尼日利亚启动一个价值 7.5 亿美元的天然气项目，这可能标志着这个非洲国家为恢复油气生产投资所做的努力正在取得进展。【原文：French energy major TotalEnergies SE may greenlight a $750 million gas project in Nigeria next year, potentially signaling that the African nation’s efforts to revive investment in its hydrocarbon production are making progress.】

item.title: 公司债券 ETF 助推巨额大宗交易崛起
item.description: 投资者只需轻点几下鼠标，就能买入或卖出数十种公司债券，组合交易的蓬勃发展正在助长几年前信贷市场上罕见的巨额交易。【原文：The boom in portfolio trading, where investors can buy or sell scores of corporate bonds with just a few clicks of a mouse, is fueling mega trades that were rare in credit markets just a few years ago.】

item.title: 第三季度增长乏力，仅为 1%，加拿大央行将继续降息
item.description: 上个月，加拿大经济在第三季度弱于预期的情况下勉强实现小幅增长，这使得加拿大央行有望继续降息。【原文：The Canadian economy eked out small growth last month after a weaker-than-forecast third quarter, keeping the Bank of Canada on track to keep cutting rates.】

item.title: 英国银行业监管委员会（BofA）指出马斯克主导的国防开支削减存在风险，BAE 系统公司股价下跌
item.description: 由于埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）监管下的美国政府可能削减开支的风险，美国银行（Bank of America Corp）分析师下调了这家英国国防设备制造商的评级，BAE 系统公司（BAE Systems Plc）股价创下两个月来最大跌幅。【原文：BAE Systems Plc shares declined the most in two months as Bank of America Corp. analysts downgraded the British defense-equipment manufacturer due to the risk of potential US government spending cuts overseen by Elon Musk.】

item.title: 受支出计划影响，巴西市场将迎来两年来最差一周
item.description: 巴西市场将迎来两年来最糟糕的一周，因为人们期待已久的削减政府开支计划只是加剧了对该国预算的忧虑。【原文：Brazilian markets were on pace for the worst week in two years after a much awaited plan to cut government spending only added to angst over the country’s budget.】

item.title: 顶级铜矿商智利恢复到大流行前的产量水平
item.description: 智利是今年铜产量最高的月份，也是自大流行病爆发前以来铜产量最高的 10 月份，因为这个最大的配线金属供应国已从项目挫折中恢复过来。【原文：Chile registered its biggest month of copper production this year, and the best October since before the pandemic, as the biggest supplier of the wiring metal recovers from project setbacks.】

item.title: 加密货币的 "中间孩子 "以太坊在竞争对手的夹击下举步维艰
item.description: 以太坊面临着关于其发展方向的紧迫问题，因为重新调整的用户体验削弱了以太坊的活跃度和费用，加剧了区块链是否将继续支撑加密货币商业的不确定性。【原文：Ethereum faces pressing questions over its direction as a rejigged user experience saps activity and fees, stoking uncertainty about whether the blockchain will continue to underpin commerce in crypto.】

item.title: 军情六处处长警告美欧不要削减对乌克兰的支持
item.description: 英国外国情报机构负责人在唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选后的首次公开讲话中警告说，如果美国和欧洲停止支持乌克兰对俄罗斯的战争，那么它们将面临跨大西洋安全崩溃的危险。【原文：The US and Europe face a breakdown in transatlantic security if they stop supporting Ukraine’s war against Russia, the head of Britain’s foreign intelligence agency warned in his first public remarks since Donald Trump’s election win.】

item.title: 阿达尼的支持者组成联合阵线反击美国指控
item.description: 在美国对高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）卷入贿赂阴谋提出重磅指控近一周后，公众对这位印度亿万富翁的支持开始慢慢升温。【原文：Almost a week after bombshell allegations by the US of Gautam Adani’s involvement in a bribery plot, an outpouring of public backing for the Indian billionaire slowly began to build.】

item.title: 天然气贸易商面临高价和管道不确定性的焦虑月份
item.description:
储存量已经低于去年，而且没有迹象表明俄乌将重新达成过境协议。【原文：

Storage levels are already lower than last year, and there’s no sign of a renewed Russia-Ukraine transit deal.

】

item.title: 食品成本增加，肯尼亚通胀率升至 2.8
item.description: 在一些食品价格上涨之后，肯尼亚的通货膨胀在 11 月份加速。【原文：Kenyan inflation accelerated in November after the prices of some food items increased.】

item.title: 阿拉比卡因供应担忧创 2014 年以来最大月度涨幅
item.description: 阿拉比卡期货有望创下十多年来的最大单月涨幅，全球供应担忧引发的涨势将价格推向接近历史最高点。【原文：Arabica futures are on track for the biggest monthly jump in more than a decade, with a rally fulled by global supply concerns sending prices to near-record highs.】

item.title: 为什么女性不太可能使用人工智能？
item.description:
人工智能的早期采用者中男性比例过高，这种脱节可能会加剧男女薪酬差距

。【原文：

AI’s early adopters are disproportionately men, a disconnect that could stands to exacerbate the gender pay gap

】

item.title: 巴西失业率降至历史新低，卢拉赢得最新胜利
item.description: 巴西的失业率降至有记录以来的最低水平，这代表着总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦在政治上的胜利，同时也加重了决策者对经济运行过热的担忧。【原文：Brazil’s jobless rate fell to the lowest level on record, representing a political win for a President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva while adding to the concern of policymakers who fear the economy is running too hot.】

item.title: 亚马逊商家成功转用低成本的 Temu
item.description: 一位商家入驻特姆优的举动表明，中国购物网站可能会给亚马逊带来真正的挑战。但首先...【原文：One merchant’s move to Temu suggests the Chinese shopping site may offer a real challenge to Amazon. But first...】

item.title: 在严酷的沙漠中种植黄瓜凸显沙特推动粮食安全的决心
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯地形最恶劣的地区之一，一个农场正在曾经无法使用的土地上种植黄瓜和西红柿等农产品。【原文：A farm in one of Saudi Arabia’s harshest terrains is growing produce from cucumbers to tomatoes on land that was once unusable.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金重心转移影响部分项目预算
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的主权财富基金正准备在第二年削减一些地方项目的预算，即使它增加了总体支出，这反映了沙特王国在一项万亿美元的经济改革计划中优先事项的变化。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is preparing to cut budgets for some local projects for a second year even as it increases overall spending, reflecting the kingdom’s shifting priorities in a trillion-dollar plan to overhaul the economy.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀数据对辩论双方都有帮助
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们将关注欧元区通胀的最新数据，以及这对利率的影响。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking at the latest reading of euro-zone inflation, and what that means for rates. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行聘请德勤为 Banco BPM 收购案提供咨询服务
item.description: 知情人士透露，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）已聘请德勤会计师事务所（Deloitte LLP）为这家意大利第二大银行收购 Banco BPM SpA 提供咨询。【原文：UniCredit SpA has hired Deloitte LLP to advise Italy’s second-biggest bank on its takeover bid for Banco BPM SpA, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 英国央行认为债券价格修正风险与绿色转型有关
item.description: 英格兰银行表示，由于未能正确考虑气候转型带来的风险，债券市场可能面临突如其来的价格冲击。【原文：Bond markets may be facing sudden price shocks due to a failure to correctly take into account the risks associated with the climate transition, according to the Bank of England.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行杠杆融资部欧洲联席主管离职
item.description: 据知情人士透露，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）欧洲杠杆融资团队联席主管路易斯-勒赫鲁（Louis L'Heureux）已经离职。【原文：Louis L’Heureux, co-head of Banco Santander SA’s leveraged finance team in Europe, has left the firm, according to people with knowledge of the move.】

item.title: 航运巨头将 60 亿美元财富转向股票市场
item.description: 据知情人士透露，希腊最富有的航运巨头玛丽亚-安杰利库西（Maria Angelicoussis）的家族办公室在私人市场的押注获得巨大收益后，正在推动公开交易投资。【原文：The family office for Maria Angelicoussis, Greece’s richest shipping magnate, is boosting publicly traded investments after notching up huge gains in private market bets, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 2024 年结束时华尔街的得与失
item.description: 对于那些投资股票的人来说，2024 年的情况出乎意料地好，S&P 500 指数的年度涨幅有望成为历史上最好的年度涨幅之一。早在 1 月份，当交易员和策略师们因担心美国经济会硬着陆而准备应对动荡时，很少有人想到这一点。【原文：How thankful Wall Streeters are this week likely depends on what asset they are paid to trade.For those investing in equities, 2024 has proven unexpectedly good with the S&P 500’s annual gain on course to be one of the best in history.Few expected that back in January when traders and strategists were bracing for turbulence amid worries the US economy was barreling toward a hard landing.Instead, the market has been lifted by a resilient economy, rising earnings and a handful of tech titans.】

item.title: 欧洲电视网与鲨鱼坦克在欧洲顶级初创企业大会上相遇
item.description:
在Slush，桑拿浴室里热气腾腾，资金流汹涌澎湃，演示、DJ和对国防科技的重视与日俱增。【原文：

The saunas were hot and the money was flowing at Slush, which featured demos, DJs and a growing emphasis on defense technology.

】

item.title: 美银美林策略师逆势押注被回避的欧洲股票
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师们正在对欧洲股票进行逆向押注，因为欧洲大陆的主要股票指数将迎来自 1976 年以来相对于美国表现最差的一年。【原文：Strategists at Bank of America Corp. are making a contrarian bet on European stocks as the continent’s main equity index heads for its worst year of underperformance relative to the US since 1976.】

item.title: 世贸组织成员批准奥孔乔-伊韦拉连任掌舵人
item.description: 世界贸易组织成员同意再次任命恩戈齐-奥孔乔-伊韦拉（Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala）连任总干事一职，使她在预计将充满关税争端的下一个四年里继续担任这一职务。【原文：World Trade Organization members agreed to reappoint Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala as director-general for a second term, cementing her in the job for another four years expected to be fraught with tariff disputes.】
